channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WV
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WV

item.title: Report X-2023111104
item.description:
Report X-2023111104

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-12T22:12:12+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-13
  • City: BEAVER
  • State: WV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Discovered on 11/11, came off trailer damaged, stuck into black totes and taken out of sort for processing. Processed later on 11/13, IPF and Damage form completed and placed into Hazmat Salvage Bucket. DescribePack: 1 Quart can of ASGCO 40 Hardener had a failure on the lid of the can, resulting in product leaking inside of the package and slightly out of, however no spillage occurred on other packages. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pulled out of sortation and placed into black totes for movement around building without leakage, pulled off of belts.

item.title: Report X-2023110877
item.description:
Report X-2023110877

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-12T22:12:12+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-08
  • City: CHARLESTON
  • State: WV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The unloader noticed that the liquid had leaked from the cap and reported it to an Ops Manager. DescribePack: Leaked due to a loose cap. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: The bucket was placed inside of hazmat bag inside a salvage drum.

item.title: Report X-2023110812
item.description:
Report X-2023110812

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-12T22:12:12+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-07
  • City: CHARLESTON
  • State: WV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: package handler found package leaking while unloading orientation arrows were ignored when loading. DescribePack: lid came off of bottle DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: put cap back on bottle put into hazmat tote with hazmat bag and neutralizer was used to neutralize the acid
